page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: AN AVERAGE SATURDAY Saturday begins at 9o'clock in the morning,and, following a breakfast of toast and cereal I go to the library at the nearby town of Castle Douglas.I usually shop for stationery and sweets before going home for lunch which is at 1p.m. My family enjoy being together and lunch is very much a family meal and social occasion.Lunch might consist of soup and bread followed by salad, and cheese and biscuits.After lunch I escape to the garden where a favourite tree provides me with much pleasure.I enjoy watching animals and birds.Soon a bike ride is decided on with my brother.After this we have supper which is our main meal of the day,perhaps consisting of a chicken casserole,broccoli and potatoes and raspberry meringue and cream.Then I read my book ,then bed.
